chunks.zh: 给六年级的小学生送什么好
chunks.en: What's a good gift for sixth graders?

chunks.zh: 如题，练习本就算了，哈哈哈
chunks.en: As the title says, notebooks are out, hahaha

chunks.zh: @jiejianshiwa #29 你是真的抽象啊，刚从红米 K70 的帖子刷到你的“墻内系統不敢用”，这就又刷到你的“民主國家并不會限制孩子觀看成人視頻”，原以为你是反串，你不会是真的这么想的吧？🤣
chunks.en: @jiejianshiwa #29 You are truly abstract. I just saw your comment "I don't dare to use the system inside the wall" on the Redmi K70 post, and now I see your comment "Democratic countries do not restrict children from watching adult videos". I originally thought you were being sarcastic, but you don't actually think this way, do you? 🤣

chunks.zh: 那就送寒假作业的答案吧
chunks.en: Then send the answers to the winter break homework.

chunks.zh: 我给我侄子送了一大盒未拆封的奥特曼卡他自己开箱  乐得嘴都歪了
chunks.en: I gave my nephew a big box of unopened Ultraman cards and he opened them himself. He was so happy his mouth was crooked.

chunks.zh: 梯子，教他科學上網，長大後會感謝你
chunks.en: A VPN, teach him to browse the internet scientifically; he will thank you when he grows up.

chunks.zh: 《儿童性启蒙教育彩图集》《儿童性别启蒙教育读本 我是男孩？我是女孩？》《青少年最想知道的性知识》《少年维特的烦恼》
chunks.en: Illustrated Picture Book of Sex Education for Children, Sex Education Reader for Children: Am I a Boy? Am I a Girl?, Sex Knowledge Teenagers Most Want to Know, The Sorrows of Young Werther

chunks.zh: @Skifary 我怕被小孩家长抢去玩
chunks.en: @Skifary I'm afraid the child's parents will snatch it to play with.

chunks.zh: 男孩送运动鞋？
chunks.en: Are you giving a boy sneakers?

chunks.zh: 男孩的话送书送玩具，女孩也是送书送玩具？ 具体还是看兴趣爱好吧，现在小孩的兴趣颇多，可以就着兴趣送
chunks.en: Books and toys for boys? Books and toys for girls too? It really depends on their interests. Children have a lot of interests nowadays, so you can give a gift based on their interests.

chunks.zh: 折叠自行车，大人小孩都能骑
chunks.en: Folding bicycles, both adults and children can ride.

chunks.zh: 蹭个楼，给初一的女孩子送什么好呢
chunks.en: Bumping the thread, what's a good gift for a seventh-grade girl?

chunks.zh: 如果玩手游的话送个 switch+几个游戏
chunks.en: If they play mobile games, give them a Switch + a few games.

chunks.zh: 皮肤
chunks.en: Skins

chunks.zh: 运动手表
chunks.en: Sports watch

chunks.zh: @Skifary 太小了不打建议送游戏机，当然特别自律的可以考虑，但 6 年级年纪还是太小，假如因为沉迷游戏影响学业，家长可能会怪罪哦。
chunks.en: @Skifary They are too young to not suggest giving a game console. Of course, you can consider it if they are particularly disciplined, but sixth grade is still too young. If they become addicted to games and affect their studies, parents might blame you.

chunks.zh: 乐高
chunks.en: LEGO

chunks.zh: 博 x 士 x 证 x 书，啊，不是
chunks.en: PhD x certificate, ah, no.

chunks.zh: 反向回答：不要送电子产品（太便宜看不上，太贵用不上，太好玩招父母恨）。
chunks.en: Reverse answer: Don't give electronic products (too cheap and they won't like it, too expensive and they can't use it, too fun and it'll anger the parents).

chunks.zh: 以前给送 kindle 是万能答案,现在估计得换个品牌了
chunks.en: Giving a Kindle used to be the universal answer, now you probably have to change the brand.

chunks.zh: @jiejianshiwa #8  送这个，大概率会拿去看黄
chunks.en: @jiejianshiwa #8 Giving this, it's highly likely they'll use it to watch porn.

chunks.zh: 超大盒奥特曼正解，大部分孩子都喜欢
chunks.en: A super-large box of Ultraman cards is the correct answer; most kids love them.
